  (->>
    (range 2 (inc (int (Math/sqrt n))))  ; - past sqrt(n) the divisors are mirrored
    (filter #(zero? (mod n %)))          ; - extract the divisors
    (reduce #(conj % %2 (/ n %2)) #{})   ; - add the mirrored divisors (we use a set for a

    (= n)))

(fn perfect [x]
  (let 
    [
     prime?
     (fn [x]
      (cond 
       (= 2 x) true
       (= 1 x) true
       (= 0 x) false
       :else (every? 
        #(< 0 (rem x %)) 
        (range 2 (+ 1 (Math/sqrt x))))
      )
     )
     divisors
     (fn [x](filter 
       #(= 0 (rem x %))
         
       
   
       (range 2 x)
      )
     )
     
     ]
    
    
  (= x (inc (apply + (divisors x))))
  
  )
)

(fn perfect? [n]
  (= n (reduce + (for [i (range 1 n)]
                   (if (= 0 (rem n i)) i 0)))))

(fn perfect? [n] (let [divisors (fn [n] (loop [cnt (dec n)
												                          xs []]
												                     (if (= 0 cnt)
												                       xs
												                       (if(zero? (mod n cnt))
												                         (recur (dec cnt) (conj xs cnt))
												                         (recur (dec cnt) xs)))))
                         s (reduce + 0 (divisors n))]
                     (= n s)))
